last_episode_to_air.name: Accused
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jones and Smith come head to head as the investigation nears its conclusion and a decision is reached that will impact the safety of all wolfbloods.

name: Wolfblood Secrets
overview: Following the events of 'Protocol', Jana is interrogated by an unknown organization about the behavior and nature of wolfbloods.

episodes.name: Powers
episodes.overview: Jones questions Jana as to whether she intended to expose the secret as part of a game plan. Jana denies being a figurehead, despite knowing that many wolfbloods have submitted to her. Jones uses Shannon's testimony to prove that she is well informed and will get to the truth. Jana talks freely about wolfblood gifts and their incredible instincts. To highlight the point, Jana reveals that she knows someone has been speaking to Jones through an earpiece. What they really want is to find out how dangerous wolfbloods truly are.

episodes.name: Wild
episodes.overview: Smith takes a more robust approach to challenging Jana's motivation for exposing the secret. He describes all Wolfbloods as feral beasts and clearly doesn't believe in coexistence. Jones reminds them both that she needs to make a ruling about whether Wolfbloods are safe. Jana draws on her own experience to argue that Wolfbloods can adapt, just as she did. Smith gives examples of Wolfbloods integrating with less success and uses Ceri's testimony to argue that everything they've heard about wild Wolfbloods leads them to believe that savagery will prevail if Wolfbloods ...

episodes.name: History
episodes.overview: Jones uses testimonies from Jeffries and Imara to challenge Jana's knowledge of the history of wolfbloods. While Imara claims that humans and wolfbloods once fought side by side, Jeffries is flattered into exposing his theory that some of the most feared figures in history were actually wolfbloods. Smith starts to wonder if Jana wants history to repeat itself and wishes to leave her own frightening legacy.

episodes.name: Vulnerabilities
episodes.overview: Dr Whitewood is pressured to share her knowledge of the wolfbloods' capabilities, and Jana is interrogated by Smith and Jones, who are seeking Alexander Kincaid's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Kincaid
episodes.overview: Jones manipulates Whitewood's version of the past to argue that Alexander Kincaid's research could have helped humans defend themselves against wolfbloods. However, Jana recalls things differently and shares her memory of how frightened Kincaid was of wolfbloods and why he hated them so much.

episodes.name: Control
episodes.overview: Smith hits a nerve with Selina when he accuses her of not being able to control her wolf.

episodes.name: Hatred
episodes.overview: The interrogation grows more personal and Matei struggles to cooperate.

episodes.name: Morwal
episodes.overview: Tension rises as Jones delves into a subject Jana would rather avoid - the Morwal.

episodes.name: Lies
episodes.overview: The investigation into wolfbloods is at a critical stage as Smith calls in a surprise witness. Will their testimony make all the difference?

episodes.name: Accused
episodes.overview: Jones and Smith come head to head as the investigation nears its conclusion and a decision is reached that will impact the safety of all wolfbloods.
